item.description:
Hi everyone,

my parents and I have decided to eat out for "turkey day" and I made reservations for 10 just in case there is anyone who would like to join us, for this seemingly fantastic spread.

I plan to arrive at 1:15 on Thanksgiving, with reservations for 1:30, so I will limit this to ten for now, and maybe be able to add more to the reservation, if anyone signs up.

Right now I have me, my parents and brother and other possibles, but no definites.

They are having quite a spread of roast beef, turkey and ham with all the fixings, and I'm sure we can get separate bills.  The buffet is $23, see the attached flyer.

If I don't see you then, hope to "meetup" soon and I would like to take this opportunity to thank all of you, and especially my organizers and Meetup attendees, for a wonderful year filled with lots of fun things to do, places to go and new people always to meet.

God Bless and a very Happy Thanksgiving to you and yours ;)  Hugs, Susan
item.how_to_find_us: ask for reservation for susan tisbert

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: alone for thanksgiving?
